page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content: There is a County Primary School in { LIFTON .}The population of children on roll is 107, the age group of the children 5_11 but 4 year olds can come for half of the day .There are 4 full time teachers one the head master Mr Peel and the Deputy Head Mr Donahue. And 1 part time teacher Mrs Peel and 1 part time secetary.There are also 2 full time kitchen staff.And 1 ancillary,also we have 1 full time helper for a partially sighted child.{ {LIFTON}School is a modern school.It was opened in 1961. The school has its own swimming pool,the school grounds are very pleasant having playing fields as well as tarmac areas Pupils transfer to Launceston Secondary Tavistock Comprehensive or Okehamton.
